OOC: In case anyone is wondering a weevil is an insect with antler like 
horns.  I think.

::Amp::
    As he crawled out of the pod on his six legs he received the distress 
call heading over he transformed using his horns for hands and he sees life.  
Seeing his battered condition he begins repairing Life as best he can.  First 
he stabilizes him so he will survive.
